mapper.select: SELECT `aa`.`id` `id`, `aur`.`username` `username`, `aur`.`identifier` `identifier`, `as`.`secret` `password`, `as`.`expired_time` `secretExpiredTime`, `aa`.`expired_time` `accountExpiredTime`, `aa`.`locked` `accountLocked`, `aur`.`expired_time` `usernameExpiredTime`, `aur`.`secret_access` `secretAccess`, `aur`.`third_part` `thirdPart`, `aur`.`validated` `validated` FROM `app_user_reference` AS `aur` LEFT JOIN `app_account` AS `aa` ON `aur`.`user_id` = `aa`.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `app_secret` AS `as` ON `aur`.`user_id` = `as`.`user_id` WHERE `aur`.`username` = #{ username } AND `aur`.`login_access` = 1 AND `aur`.`deleted` = 0
